      • test

        public boolean test(int numEvents,
                    double clock)
        A simple self test method.

        This method creates the specified number of events and executes the doEvents method until the simulation clock reaches the specified time.

        Parameters:
        numEvents -
        clock -
        Returns:
        true if tests were run successfully.
